questions.question: What is the most effective method for securing data on a lost or stolen laptop?
In which of the given scenarios is it reasonable to anticipate some level of privacy?

options.A: Sharing a comment on a friend's social media page
options.B: Providing personal details on a school enrollment website
options.D: Sending emails and pictures to a close family member

questions.question: What data type should a developer use to store an alphanumeric postal code in a variable?
Which of the following is most similar to machine language?
What is the primary purpose of using a function in programming?

options.A: To hold a list of numbers.
options.B: To be divided into reusable components.
options.D: To define variables to hold different values.

questions.question: Which option offers the fastest transfer rate when transferring a file across the network?
A technician has been tasked with assigning an IP address to a newly acquired desktop computer. Which of the following represents a suitable IP address for the technician to assign?
What is the most suitable computing device for a game developer who requires a system with robust and upgradeable specifications to accommodate the demands of game engine software?
A company needs multiple reports that analyze interconnected information from sales, inventory, marketing, and compensation data. What is the most suitable location for storing this data?

The computer user is downloading software from the Internet and observes the following at the end of the installation file: 'x86.exe'. Which of the following statements best conveys the meaning of 'x86.exe' in the installation file?

options.A: x86 only supports an installation on a 32-bit CPU architecture
options.B: x86 supports an installation on a 32-bit and a 64-bit CPU architecture
options.C: x86 only supports an installation on a 64-bit CPU architecture
options.D: x86 supports an installation on a 16-bit CPU architecture
